meanings.definition: Careful and persistent work or effort.
meanings.sent1: She showed great diligence in completing her homework on time.
meanings.sent2: His diligence in studying paid off when he aced the exam.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's diligence in gathering nuts for winter was truly impressive.
meanings.sent4: The artist's diligence in perfecting every brushstroke made her painting come alive.
meanings.sent5: The detective's diligence in solving the case led to the capture of the criminal.

meanings.definition: The quality of being diligent; carefulness.
meanings.sent1: Her diligence in checking the details prevented any mistakes in the report.
meanings.sent2: The supervisor praised the team for their diligence in following safety protocols.
meanings.sent3: The cat's diligence in grooming itself made it the most well-groomed pet in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's diligence in planning engaging lessons kept the students interested and focused.
meanings.sent5: The gardener's diligence in tending to the plants resulted in a beautiful, flourishing garden.
